column4: in mplayer, if I click on a file, it complains it can't open the selected video-out device, running mplayer from the command line will play the file, but then it tells me the card has no xvideo support
xvinfo says no adaptors are present
glxgears produces a frame rate which is way too low
did u try mplayer preferences and change video to xv?
Error opening/initializing the seleted video_out (-vo) device
It seems there is no xvideo support for your video card available
